#summary Object JS structure

= Introduction =

Each NUL object (nul.obj) are !JavaScript objects.

== !JavaScript objects composition ==

The JS objects contain these properties :
|| attr || Associative list || A list of the nul.obj properties. Detailed in JsNulObjAttributes. ||
||| || *Existence check functions* || Verify how many fixed values can this fuzzy object take. ||
|| minXst || function(`klg`) || Function returning the minimum possible fixed values in a given context. ||
|| maxXst || function(`klg`) || Function returning the maximum possible fixed values in a given context. ||
|| fixed || function(`klg`) || Function returning weither the existence is strictly one ({{{fixed = 1==minXst && 1==maxXst}}}). ||
